fr.laple.controller.exercises

Class AbstractExerciseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.laple.controller.exercises.AbstractExerciseController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeInputExerciseController, QcmInputController

    public abstract class AbstractExerciseController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An abstract class to generalize exercises controllers
    Author:
    anthonyrey
    See Also:
    AbstractExerciseView, FreeInputExerciseView, FreeInputExerciseController, QcmInputController
